title: FS: T206 Gandil Red Hindu PSA3
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Gandil Red Hindu PSA3
posts.post_content: This card is supposedly a difficult combo.  And happens to present very well for the grade.   At first glance looks like a no brainer "4" I suppose some minor border bumps knocked it down?  $2400 OBO
When youre posting a card for $2400! a pic would be nice chief.

Never able to figure out how to post phone pics. But have it available for anyone who would like one.  Just email me
[url]Scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

[quote name="Stetson_1883" post=1582957]When youre posting a card for $2400! a pic would be nice chief.[/QUOTE]

Plus 1    Well then......I'll pass on by

Thought these scans would help......
